Key Match Events: Luguentz Dort poured in 20 points to lead the Thunder to a 105-93 victory over the Spurs
Chet Holmgren scored seven points during a 14-7 run to help Oklahoma City stretch its lead to 42-26
The Thunder led by 19 in the first half and maintained a double-digit cushion
Pre-Game Insights: The highly anticipated matchup between Chet Holmgren and Victor Wembanyama never fully unfolded as Wembanyama limped to the locker room after seemingly injuring his foot
Post-Match Reflections: Remarkably, Wembanyama didn't attempt a single shot in the second half
Holmgren had 19 points on 7-of-10 shooting, along with five rebounds and two blocks
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder made a season-high 17 three-pointers
Opponents are averaging 94.75 points per game against Oklahoma City, which is 4-0 for the first time since the 2016-17 season
Others: After Boston's loss at Indiana earlier in the night, the Thunder and the Cleveland Cavaliers are the only undefeated teams in the league
